name: Finnish trade union representation to the EU
membership: FinUnions represents Finnish trade union confederations. The total membership of their affiliated unions is 1.7 million.
memberOrga: FinUnions is the Brussels representation of SAK, STTK and YTN.
goal:
FinUnions represents Finnish trade union confederations (SAK, STTK and YTN) in Brussels.

For further information on the confederations and their objectives:

SAK: www.sak.fi
STTK: www.sttk.fi
YTN: www.ytn.fi
interests: Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Trade
euInitiatives: FinUnions follows all EU policies that are relevant to the interests of the members of our affiliated trade unions, and of employees more generally. Our particular focus is on labour and economic policies. FinUnions works on behalf of its member federations to ensure that the voice of Finnish workers is heard in European policy-making.
